# sqh-copy-button

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property          | Attribute         | Description                                                               | Type      | Default     |
| ----------------- | ----------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `backgroundcolor` | `backgroundcolor` | Background & border color of the copy button.                             | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `borderradius`    | `borderradius`    | Configure border radius with pixel amount                                 | `number`  | `undefined` |
| `codefontcolor`   | `codefontcolor`   | Text color of the fuel tank code.                                         | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `codefontsize`    | `codefontsize`    | Font size of the fuel tank code.                                          | `number`  | `undefined` |
| `copyfailure`     | `copyfailure`     | Shown when the button has failed to copy the code to the users clipboard. | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `copysuccess`     | `copysuccess`     | Shown when the code is successfully copied to the users clipboard.        | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `fontsize`        | `fontsize`        | Font size of the copy button text.                                        | `number`  | `undefined` |
| `ishidden`        | `ishidden`        | Hide or show the component                                                | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `rewardkey`       | `rewardkey`       | rewardkey is used to get the fuel tank code for a user.                   | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `text`            | `text`            | Text shown inside the copy button.                                        | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `textcolor`       | `textcolor`       | Color of text inside the copy button.                                     | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `width`           | `width`           | Sets a maximum width on the copy button.                                  | `number`  | `undefined` |
